1._title: What is your computer mainly used for?

2._title: Do you like to install and configure software yourself or should everything "just work"?

options.a: I like to install and configure software myself
options.c: I do both depending on the situation

3._title: Do you value always using the latest games and software?

options.a: I always want to play the latest games
options.c: It doesn't always have to be the newest as long as it works
options.d: I only use older software and games
